item.title: Hegseth responds to report that boat survivors were killed on his orders

item.title: Pope Leo XIV visits Istanbul's iconic Blue Mosque on Turkey trip
item.description: Pope Leo XIV visited Istanbul's historic Blue Mosque, officially known as the Sultan Ahmed Mosque, as part of his trip to Turkey.

item.title: Russian attacks kill 3 in Kyiv as Ukrainian delegation travels to U.S.
item.description: Russian drone and missile attacks in and around the Ukrainian capital killed at least three people early Saturday, officials said.

item.title: Shopping mall shooting wounds 2, prompts Black Friday evacuation in the Bay Area
item.description: Police in California evacuated a shopping mall on one of the busiest shopping days of the year after a shooting left two people with gunshot wounds

item.title: WATCH: Military funeral in Kyiv for American volunteer fighter
item.description: ABC News’ Ian Pannell is in Kyiv, Ukraine, at the funeral of an American who lost his life fighting against Russia’s invasion.
